short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace certain words in Advent of Code to make it Jewish-friendly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy doing Advent of Code but it's the wrong religion for you? No more! Install this extension and experience the regular AoC, with a Jewish twist. Help the Rebbe and his Chassidim earn 50 Chanuka candles in time for Chanuka with the Shul Calendar of Code.

Functionally, all this does is switch out words on the page for different words. No data is sent or received from any server.
